definitions.definition: An ornamentation , worn on the shoulders of a military uniform , as a sign of rank .
A similar piece of trimming on a lady’s dress .
A plate on the anterior wings of some insects .
The red patch on the shoulders of a red-winged blackbird .

main_definition: An ornamentation , worn on the shoulders of a military uniform , as a sign of rank .
secondary_definitions: A similar piece of trimming on a lady’s dress .
A plate on the anterior wings of some insects .
The red patch on the shoulders of a red-winged blackbird .
